title: Generative AI Tutorial

metadata.description: Learn about Generative AI Tutorial with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
[+:
Learn Generative AI
Generative AI can help boost your productivity if used correctly.
AI prompt engineering is one of the hottest jobs in tech.
Knowing how to write prompts correctly is the key to helping you use generative AIs.
Start learning AI Prompt Engineering now ❯
Learning by Doing
In these tutorials, you get step-by-step guides on how to write AI prompts to get the best possible results from text-to-text and text-to-image generative AIs.
You will learn to understand Generative AI capabilities and write prompts that minimize misinformation and biased results.
You will learn how to preface your prompts and add details to them to generate consistent results.
Learning by Examples
In these tutorials, we will use examples to better explain the various concepts.
Example
With the following prompt:
Explain "Generative AI" like I'm 5 years old
A response from a Generative AI (in this case, ChatGPT) could be:

Create a free  account and get access to more features and learning materials:
View your completed tutorials, exercises, and quizzes
Keep an eye on your progress and daily streaks
Set goals and create learning paths
Create your own personal website

Note:
This is an optional feature. You can study at  without creating an account.

★

summary: This tutorial covers Generative AI Tutorial concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Generative AI Tutorial effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Generative AI Tutorial and how to apply it in your projects.
